website_summaries.verdict: Soft, plastic animal friends squirt water for interactive fun.
pros: Classic squirting toys for bathtime shenanigans
Parents enjoy the many pieces that come with the set, which is nice for siblings to share
The animals are designed to be cute, with friendly faces
The size is perfect for little baby hands
The animals also float and sink depending on how much water they have in them, and their various shapes are great for sensory exploration
cons: You must make sure they are empty of water to avoid mold and mildew build inside these toys

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute toys
customer_reviews.text: Super Cute toys, my daughter loved it, but after a month it became very moldy. I tried cleaning with vinegar / bleach / hot water.... It helped, but it did not get rig of it all. I would not use this product over 2 months, unless the company comes out with a cleaning product specific for these water toys.
customer_reviews.author: Janaina Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: Lots of cute animals!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old likes the cute animals. There is potential for mild growth inside, if you are not carefull. For the value of money, use it 6 months and buy another set, or wash it once in a while with some vinegar and or baking soda.
customer_reviews.author: Chaz Ferna

customer_reviews.title: Unsustainable Squirting
customer_reviews.text: They're cute. They're fun. But, as other people mention, it's really hard to get the water out to reduce mold growth. I haven't had mold yet, but it seems inevitable. I squeeze and squeeze after baths, hang upside down to dry, and give different toys "breaks" so they're not submerged nightly. Doesn't matter. I'll pick one up and shake it and you'll hear the water slosh around. I'm going to dry them out and glue-gun the holes next. It defeats the purpose of a "squirt" toy, but I'll take that over a squirt of mold in my kids' faces any day.
customer_reviews.author: Siobhan

customer_reviews.title: My baby enjoyed them very much until I noticed something dark inside ...
customer_reviews.text: These are cute little bath toys but unfortunately gather mold within a few days of use because they have little holes for squirting water . My baby enjoyed them very much until I noticed something dark inside the yellow little duck. I cut it to check and it was indeed black mold. Unfortunately the design is defective because they are supposed to be used in water and to be filled with water but there is no easy way to completely dry them afterwards, therefore they develop mold. You don't want your baby chewing on moldy toys.
customer_reviews.author: Obi Van

customer_reviews.title: Holes in Bath Toys = Black Mold
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and fun for the bath, however since there are holes in them (for squirting), water consistently gets inside and creates black mold. I've seen people online that state you can use a hot glue gun to seal the hole, which I might do to salvage these. Save yourself the hassle and buy bath toys without holes to prevent mold and having to clean bath toys with bleach almost weekly!
customer_reviews.author: Allie & David F

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I really love these toys but most importantly so does my 1 year old daughter. These toys are very durable but yet easy to squish the water out of so mold doesn't grow. They've held up great to her occasional biting and have served us well through 100+ bathes so far. Plus, they don't hurt so much when launched at you from a tantrum throwing child who doesn't want to get out of the tub. Bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Mold
customer_reviews.text: We bought these toys on 5/6/17. We noticed one of the toys looked off colored. We cut it open and found mold inside the toy. Please see photos for reference.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Kraft

customer_reviews.title: Paint Comes Off Easily
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 8 month old baby to keep her distracted in the bath. She of course likes to chew on everything (like most babies) and is now 10 months old. I noticed MOST of the paint has come off in those 2 months and have seen little bits of the paint in her mouth. The other part I care less about is the fact some of the paint was messy to begin with, not as attractive as the pictures. Basically, you get what you paid for as far as pricing.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Black Stuff Comes Out Eventually
customer_reviews.text: Cute, colorful, squirty, floaty, and my daughter loves to play with them at bath time. But after not too long, we noticed tiny scraps of black weird stuff coming out of the squirt hole - probably matted bacteria. Definitely not safe after that and there's no way to keep the inside clean. We'll be throwing these away and getting similar bath toys without a squirt hole now.
customer_reviews.author: Alex from DiscDish

customer_reviews.title: Great for babies and toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It's soft and easier to "squirt" for little hands. We had another brand that was durable and easy to clean but hard, my LO had difficult time squeezing these toys. These ones on the other hand are perfect size, realistic features of animals, colourful , soft and easy to squeeze for little ones. She enjoyed this toys right out of the box and enjoyed playing with them in her bath
customer_reviews.author: Edwin M.Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Molds fast!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for bath time! They float but you can also fill them with water and squirt the water out. Also some are easier for little ones to suck in if they’re teething. We use these and one bath book for our 6 month old. Updated!!! Sept 2019 - Warning - I noticed black stuff coming out of the toys and it is disgusting. I always squeeze the water out but it seems to collect mold really easily.
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: Loads of fun for bath time for my 8 month old
customer_reviews.text: Since getting these tub toys my 8 month old son loves bath time. He really likes the squirting feature and there are 10 different figures. He loves all the toys and its a nice size where it's not to small where he will swallow it but not to big to handle. Material feels pretty durable and easy to drain and dry toys. Highly recommend these tub toys!
customer_reviews.author: Big T

customer_reviews.title: Ok for their price
customer_reviews.text: These bath toys are "alright" they didn't last as long as I would have liked but I guess that's what you get for this price. They lasted almost a year before going mouldy on the inside and needed throwing out. Was worth it while they lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: Black reside on toys over time
customer_reviews.text: This toy causes some form of decay. Over time, the water began spitting out a black residence. I cut open the toys and it was all around. Even if you empty the toys out overall, something still causes a black residue to form which sprays out with the water. It’s alarming and very like chemically unsafe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Filled with Mildew
customer_reviews.text: The toys filled with mildew within a couple of months even though I squirted our all of the water after each bath. They won’t come clean. So, when my son squirts them, sometimes into his mouth, shreds of grey mildew come out. I threw them away. Don’t but these. Get a water toy that doesn’t have a hole in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good in the beginning
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our son to help make bath time more fun and something he looks forward to. When we first got them, he loved playing with them and they were really nice. Over time, water got into the toys and they became very moldy. We ended up throwing them away due to being hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jlrrx2206

customer_reviews.title: Cute bath toys
customer_reviews.text: These were really cute. Bought them for my toddler for Easter a big hit with him and little brother. Would be a really cute gift! Some of the animals are difficult to get all the water out of but I find that with anything like these. They are a really nice size and sturdy material. Would buy again once we need new ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grear toys but only for a bit
customer_reviews.text: I loved these toys at first because there are so many at an affordable price, but I hate how I couldn't completely remove the water from within them. I highly recommend them for short term use in fear of mold growing within them. Other than that they are extremely entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Tereza

customer_reviews.title: Warning! Bacteria collection inside product with use..
customer_reviews.text: Warning warning! Omg!!! This product is traumatic! It collects bacteria on the inside. Making baby water dirty and unsanitary. Stay away away away! Baby likes it but has no idea what’s inside! Mom protect your child, by never buying this take it off the market, or do something to change this bacterial growth! Nastiest thing I have seen..
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: bad smell
customer_reviews.text: Are they cute? absolutely. Do they float nicely? yes. But oh my, they smell so bad, toxic even. At first I thought they just need to be left on open air for a few days to get the toxic/plastic smell out, but it didn't work. Then I decided to wash it with soap and then detergent but nothing worked, my baby puts everything in her mouth and that smell makes me tear so I decided not to give them to her.
customer_reviews.author: sun

customer_reviews.title: Container top missing!
customer_reviews.text: The person in charge of packing these bath tub toys placed the container into shipping envelope without the top lid for the container. Going to be awkward to wrap container without lid. I don't want my niece to think I bought her baby a used item, or inferior item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bath time fun!
customer_reviews.text: Such cute toys!!! My LO loves them. Great for learning hands right size to grab and fit in little hands. Only worry is leaving water in them may create mold. I try to get all the water out of them every bath time but of course you can’t really take all of it out. Other then that love them.
customer_reviews.author: Georgina

customer_reviews.title: Mold?
customer_reviews.text: Omg is this mold? My child have been chewing on these toys. I kept noticing black stuff in my baby bath water and wonder wondered what it is was. Then I decided to cut two of the toys opened and saw this. Disgusting!!
customer_reviews.author: Disgusted

customer_reviews.title: Grew mold easily
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely no way to clean the inside or keep them dry inside. Several grew mold inside within a few weeks and we had to throw them out. Our daughter loved them, but if I would buy again I’d probably glue the hole shut so that water couldn’t get into them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bath toys for my little one
customer_reviews.text: The product is just as described. My son loves it! However, there is only one thing that I do not like about this product. which is that it is hard to dry it fully. The outside is okay, but the inside, you have to shake it around, tab on the towel, etc. to empty it (the octopus and turtle are the hardest). Other than that everything is great.
customer_reviews.author: Cho

customer_reviews.title: Something growing. Hint...not your kids!
customer_reviews.text: It is made from decent rubber built, its color and shapes are appealing. However, my main concern is that is hard to clean. As your baby use it in the bath be aware that eventually, the fungus will grow inside them. I wouldn't keep using it for more than 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made, cute and colorful
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 2 year old granddaughter. She loves them! They are cute and colorful and don't look cheap at all. They are made a of a durable plastic and easy enough for a 2 year old to squeeze the water out of most of them. They come in a nice tube and store neatly.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Develops mildew!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these toys every single night with my son in the bath for almost 6 months now and I started to see mildew in the bath water and wondered where it was coming from. Well it came from inside the toys!!! I was so grossed out so I cleaned them all as best as I could but can’t get it all out. I wouldn’t have assumed these would develop mildew since they have a hole letting air in to dry them, but apparently they do. So gross! Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Keepitpink

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get water out of them
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves these but some of them are really hard to get all the water out of so I’m afraid they will get gross and moldy on the inside pretty quickly. They are really cute though and a great variety of animals
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Count and make sure
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great but I was shorted one. It was fir Easter and when I was laying them out is when I figured it out
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Great buy (clean properly)
customer_reviews.text: I really love these, I ordered new ones because it was time, I would squeeze out the water in these after each use and then get something the put the toys in so they aren’t laying in tub so that they don’t grow mold (inside). But packaging is great, all of them were they. Perfect for some tub fun for my kids!
customer_reviews.author: Maydin E.

customer_reviews.title: Baby likes them
customer_reviews.text: My baby plays with these during bath time, havent had any issues with them. She seems to enjoy them, so no complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and made sturdy
customer_reviews.text: these are just the right size that i don't have to worry about a child swallowing them. The plastic is heavy duty but soft enough the child can still squeeze them the color is great also, very colorful. I will continue to purchase these.
customer_reviews.author: Dbaker

customer_reviews.title: Suggest for 1 year or older baby
customer_reviews.text: I think it fit for 1 year or older baby. My 7 months baby only want to eat them, I try many times. While he just start to learn how to use fingers, his power cannot help him play this toy. Also, the smell was very strong!
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: Good price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Baby will have the time of her life in the bath with these. They are great! Cute and easy to wash and out away.
customer_reviews.author: MissCasciano

customer_reviews.title: Cute toys!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 9 years old with special needs and she absolutely loves these. She can’t wait to take a bath everyday and put all of these toys in the bath with her. They are also very cute! Would buy again as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: liliana lizalde

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves these!
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old grandson loves these. They’re cute, the perfect size for his little hands, easily washable and squirt water gently fo bath time fun. I even gave them as a gift to others too.
customer_reviews.author: rms

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift. They are cute buy i do know they are not a survivors in a tub. These toys have holes at the bottom and tent to grow mold inside of them. After couple of weeks of use you should trash them in order to avoid your child getting the mold in the tub or in his/her mouth....
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy yet easy to squeeze
customer_reviews.text: Most of them are quite easy to squeeze so my almost 2-year-old niece shouldn't have any issue giving her mom Hell during bath-time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy, gets moldy quickly
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed at how fast mold grew in these. Even with making sure the water was drained and holes faced down, they got moldy very quickly. :( our son loved them though, he loves playing with them, just not sure how to keep them from getting moldy.
customer_reviews.author: Cedarrose1

customer_reviews.title: A couple of weird things
customer_reviews.text: When I got the toys, it was obvious the toys had been opened and then resealed. They also have a 2013 date. They also don’t say anything like BPA Free. Ultimately didn’t use.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D Shepley

customer_reviews.title: Great as a gift.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these bath toys for my neice’s 1st birthday. The toys hold her interest. Like other parents written, these types of bath toys can mold. Yes, even 15 years ago when my children were toddlers, these types of bath toys mold. Please inspect before playing.
customer_reviews.author: Amrw

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: my kids love them. just put in a brand new bath tub so of course we had to get new bath time toys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute Bath Toys (Make Sure to Squirt All the Water Out)
customer_reviews.text: These bath toys are great for the price. Good material and you get plenty. My daughter loves playing with them in the bath. We put about half in the bath and leave the other half out of water so she can play with them separately. The only downside is that water gets trapped easily in the toys, so you have to shake them and squirt the water out a little more once bath time is over. Not very time consuming, but important to do to allow them to dry and avoid mold from forming.
customer_reviews.author: Denise H.

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and cute
customer_reviews.text: My daughter can’t wait for her bath everyday so she can play with these toys. The plastic seems a little thinner than the ones I got at target, but they’re fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very fun, cute, can be chewed on
customer_reviews.text: Our 1 year old loves them in the bath. Try to squeeze them out after every bath or cover the hole with super glue to keep from getting too nasty inside the small squirt hole. Nice rubber so if the toddler teethes on them its not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Totally cute set. Only problem is keeping them away from my dog, she's already chewed up 2 of them. I like how soft and squishy they are, easy for my 9 month old to handle.
customer_reviews.author: AB7105

customer_reviews.title: He doesn't like bath time so we have too trick him by ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our 4 months old they were so cute and he loves too play with them in the water. He doesn't like bath time so we have too trick him by saying he gets too go swimming lol. But you fill them up with water and they squirt so it would make you feel like you was playing with little squirt guns. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable! Son loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Great little bath toys! Quality made, fun shapes and colors. My 11 month old son loves to chew on them during his bath. He doesn't know how to squirt them yet but they provide enough distraction that I can get him washed up quickly without him squirming around and trying to get out of the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect... But
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my babies needed. The only problem I had was the really strong chemical smell. Smells don't usually bother me but this was extreme. They were fine after a washing though.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Deezy

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! Too much mold!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bath toys for my one year old because they are cute but was highly disappointed in the amount of mold they develop after just a short month or two! There's no way of cleaning them, I spent an hour trying to get all the mold to come out of them and ended up just throwing them all away, will be buying just anti mold toys from now on.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Cute! Fun for baby!
customer_reviews.text: Grand baby loves playing with these during bath time..big eyes and colorful. I would of given 5 stars if they all squirted water like they're suppose too..some of them do and some of them don't
customer_reviews.author: Gary Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Good product for short time
customer_reviews.text: They are great products for your kids to play with, but they are not easy to clean. If you don’t get all the water out they do get moldy on the inside so be careful with that.
customer_reviews.author: Backcross

customer_reviews.title: Bathtub Toys
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids love these to play in the bathtub, but they fill up with water and you need to make sure to squeeze them out to get water out. Otherwise they get moldy.
customer_reviews.author: Idia A. Sylvestro

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these! I try getting her new bath toys often to avoid molding and these are super cute and affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Lizz

customer_reviews.title: 18 month old daughter loves these.
customer_reviews.text: 18 month old Daughter loves these! We use them in the bath and the pool. In the pool it’s great for her to have a goal to “get the fish” and to help her swim over to it.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie

customer_reviews.title: My son loves these in the tub and lit!
customer_reviews.text: These have holes so we took some Gorilla glue and plugged them to avoid Mold issues but our 9 month old son loves these in the bath and out! Perfect size for little hands, bright colors, cute animals and good value!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Kos

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (12 months at purchase) loves these toys. She loves to take a bath even more because of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Moldy after a month of use!
customer_reviews.text: The characters are beautiful and playing in the bath is funny, but after a month or 2 of use, it became very moldy in the inside, we could not tight them to play with the water with my baby, because the mold was coming out also.
customer_reviews.author: Kenia Jaquez Veloz

customer_reviews.title: Packaging sharp edges
customer_reviews.text: The product was just but nothing special. My toddler was next to me while I opened the toys and put them in the tub. He picked up the plastic lid and the edges were sharp. So be cautious
customer_reviews.author: Tese

customer_reviews.title: Eehh
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and all animals but those animal toys doesn't stand up straight when you put on the water
customer_reviews.author: Mehmet Turan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bath time
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect little bath toys for baby. My 4 month old grandson loves these cute little animals
customer_reviews.author: Lenia Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great for bath time
customer_reviews.text: Great for 1 year Old bath time. Must remove water or mildew will grow. Once a month cleaning with Clorox/water
customer_reviews.author: Tosha Pack

customer_reviews.title: They get moldy
customer_reviews.text: They get moldy - after a few months I noticed there was crap in the tub all the time. Finally figured out it was mold in the toys even though I made sure to squeeze all the water out of them after every bath.
customer_reviews.author: MRidd

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs also enjoy stealing them and chewing them up
customer_reviews.text: Our son loves these, but I wish they didn’t have a hole in them to squirt water bc now I’m worried about mold and will periodically need to bleach them. Our dogs also enjoy stealing them and chewing them up :)
customer_reviews.author: Vanilly

customer_reviews.title: Moldy Inside
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these. The only downside is that they eventually get moldy inside which is not good.
customer_reviews.author: KEW6421

customer_reviews.title: BATHTUB BUDDIES!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT FUN IN THE TUB! VERY WELL MADE AND THE FACT THAT THEY SQUIRT ONLY ADDS TO THEIR CHARM!
customer_reviews.author: Hopalong

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good little set of bath toys.
customer_reviews.text: Buying these shut my kid up about not having enough bath toys. Because ya know, 50 billion is not enough.
customer_reviews.author: TellItHowItis

customer_reviews.title: Whose kid doesn't like bath/pool toys
customer_reviews.text: Whose kid doesn't like bath/pool toys? These are cute. You should take care to get all the water out of them. They could get a little moldy inside if they sit around for a bit and then when you squeeze....
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Toys
customer_reviews.text: I glued the holes closed so no water can get in. Now they are great and I don’t have to worry about mold.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: So cute and fun
customer_reviews.text: These are so much fun for bathtime. Nicely packaged and I can’t wait for my little one to play with these!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Clifton

customer_reviews.title: Gre mold quickly
customer_reviews.text: I clean my daughters bath toys once a week with bleach. Despite this these grew mold on the inside within 2 weeks of use. Had to throw them out. Don't waste your money. Buy mold free toys for the bath.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: My little guy and i absolutely love these bath toys
customer_reviews.text: My little guy and i absolutely love these bath toys . Yes they do have a whole , and yes water does go inside . But for the price, you can definitely toss them out and get new ones when time comes .
customer_reviews.author: Olga Kuntz

customer_reviews.title: Mold inside quickly
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure all toys like this will be the same result.. but gathered mold inside very quickly. Always squirted all water out and shook to get water out after use.. but got moldy quick
customer_reviews.author: ShoppingQueen

customer_reviews.title: Use glue gun to plug holes!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. I hate buying bath toys with holes (hello mold) but here is a tip: use hot glue gun to plug hole and you don't have to worry about water entering the toy. So now these toys won't mold. They are so cheap and my child loves naming the animals and playing in the bath. So worth such little money.
customer_reviews.author: K Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Safe to chew, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I choose this brand because it's safe to chew. My daughter is teething so she almost put everything in her mouth. Nuby doesn't contain BPA or other harmful ingredients. I would recommend this to other parents.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Wrong amount
customer_reviews.text: This came with 5 even though the description clearly says 10 and it didn’t even come in a package this is supposed to be a Christmas present. Not satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Hayden sprawls

customer_reviews.title: cute at first but after 2-3 months it got mold inside
customer_reviews.text: I tried to glue the holes but the toys didn't hold the glue and it was dangerous for the baby. I did dry it very good and made sure there was no water left each time..but still. it has mold inside. it's a shame :/
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: Needs a way to be cleaned
customer_reviews.text: There is no way to get them clean on the inside and after a few baths mold starts to grow inside
customer_reviews.author: Skingraphix

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how cheap these were! The quality is fantastic and my son loves them. Plus they are super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B.

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to get water out when finished using
customer_reviews.text: These are sold as safe for kids, which they are. But you can't get all the water out and I know I probably have an inside mold issue eventually unless I can find a solution.
customer_reviews.author: OLC

customer_reviews.title: Cute bath squirters
customer_reviews.text: Cute bath squirters. As with most (or all) rubber squirters, they easily get mold. Overall, they are good value for the money and my kids (1 and 4 yrs) like playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: Heather B.

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Great item. My kid loves these bath toys. I actually included some of these in gift bags for some of the babies at my daughter’s birthday party and they were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Deena A

customer_reviews.title: Cute water friends
customer_reviews.text: This are too cute and every child should have them to play with. Even thou right now they are chew toys for those teething days but still worth it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bath toys!! Would repurchase. My little guy loves them! Packaging was good too. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Britney K.

customer_reviews.title: Cute variety
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these animals. They are super cute and fun to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Bozzy fam

customer_reviews.title: Cute bath toys!
customer_reviews.text: Cute bath toys that my kiddos enjoy! Only negative is that after about 6 months you have to change them out and get some new ones because mold starts growing inside.
customer_reviews.author: NataliaH

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my baby cousin. They were adorable and he seemed to enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: After a while mildew accumulates. I would not buy these plastic bath toys in hindsight.
customer_reviews.author: PARUL PANDE

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Good price for multiple bath toys. My niece loved them. They were packaged well and shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: DanaBelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My 10 month old son LOVES these! It even came with an extra little squeaky ducky which is his favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Ann Casey

customer_reviews.title: Entertains my son for a surprisingly long time!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these toys. He will chew on them and examine them in his hand. I am pleasantly surprised by how much he enjoys these toys.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Wilder

customer_reviews.title: Big hit
customer_reviews.text: Used these for Easter eggs inserts for my little ones friends.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Parrott

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE OF MOLD!
customer_reviews.text: I would be very good at squeezing any excess water out of these after bath time and they still were able to grow mold. My 11 month old was squeezing them and the bath tub was filled with little particles. I cut open one is the toys and it was filled with mold. They should make these toys not squeezable and just little bath rubber toys.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Alarcon

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves these, can be difficult to get water out of some of them.
customer_reviews.text: Some are oddly shaped making it difficult to get all the water out after bath time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great packaging
customer_reviews.text: Packaging is great for bringing them along to the pool. Only complaint is that some of the squirt holes are located in spots that make it difficult to come out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute sea animals that my two year old loves splashing around during bath time! Wish I had bought these earlier
customer_reviews.author: IceLady

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. When this came the toys weren’t even packaged; they were just scattered in a box. This was supposed to be a gift. These toys look and feel VERY cheap. Save your money; do not buy. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get all water out.
customer_reviews.text: Will probably mold eventually, hard to get water out of the different shapes.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Manhart

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Once water gets in.... they squirt out some black stuff
customer_reviews.author: Lara S.

product_meta.title: Nuby 10 Count (Pack of 1) Little Squirts Fun Bath Toys, Assorted Characters
product_meta.description:
Size:10 Count (Pack of 1)Make bath time a splash with colorful Little Squirts Bath Toys from Nuby. Little Squirts help improve coordination and encourage imaginative play. Squeeze and squirt streams of water from these playful aquatic characters. Bright colors and playful designs will provide countless hours of fun for your little one. This product exceeds all government safety regulations and standards including Toy Safety Standard ASTM F963. BPA Free.

BRAND STORY
By Nuby
feature_bullets: NOTE: This is an assorted product; color and print advertised are subjected to vary.
Fun floating characters include alligator, crab, shark, duck, fish, octopus, penguin, dolphin, starfish, and turtle
Soft rubber characters squirt water when squeezed, making bath time more fun
Helps improve baby's hand-eye coordination and encourages imaginative play
Brightly colored and the perfect size for babies little hands to hold and squeeze;6 Months + / BPA Free
Please allow the toys to thoroughly air dry in a light airy location before being stored. Failure to do so may result in the growth of harmless yet unsightly aquatic algaes
Fun characters squirt and float in the bath and helps develop good hand eye coordination
Brightly colored and the perfect size for babies little hands to hold and squeeze
Each character squirts and blows bubbles under the water, providing hours of bathtime fun

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,742 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
